channel.title: Boss monster attack problem
channel.description: Downloaded Orical X's source and like most people who downloaded it have seen it has bugs, But theres one bug on it that i cant seem to fix, everytime i attack some monsters (usually the boss monsters like corp, kbd and others) my character runs in the oposite direction, nocliping threw walls and other objects. can someone tell me how to fix?

item.title: Boss monster attack problem
item.dc:creator: @alberto2man alberto2man
item.description:
@alberto2man wrote:

hey well can u help me fix this and drops, im not trying to leach this its just a private project im working on with a friend, i wont give credit to my self if anyone asks, i prob wont release i just need to fix these problems. if u can share with me acouple of scripts on how to fix that would be great. if u cant or dont want to thats alright

Read full topic
